original_text: These were the men counted by Moses and Aaron and the twelve leaders of Israel, each one representing his family.
korean_text: 이 계수함을 받은 자는 모세와 아론과 각기 이스라엘 조상의 가문을 대표한 열두 지휘관이 계수하였더라

sentences.original_text: These were the men counted by Moses and Aaron
and the twelve leaders of Israel
